answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!A single reading of low lymphocytes is not very diagnostic unless the value is really very low and can be due to a viral infection, post flu, due to low Vit B12 and folic acid. You need to wait as advised and repeat the test. In all probability it will come back to normal.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage.  Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: Went for general check up at doctor's, which included blood test for known diseases, i.e. diabetes, hiv, etc. Also checked colesterol, and blood pressure.White blood cells a little low.Other platelets/cells thoroughly tested and nothing came up.All other tests good, ie, heart liver lung, diabetes, blood pressure, thyroids, platelets, other blood cell platelets.  Doctor said its possible transient virus, of which there are a variety.  Said would check again on my next visit, not at all worried, due to results other tests on blood cells.  Also had body check for tumors, breast check, uterus, ovarian,etc.  All good.Any other answers?
title: Lymphocytes
